entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Detah
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 10:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.7°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -37.1°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023
